summary: Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.
cast: Sushant Singh Rajput|Rajkummar Rao|Amit Sadh|Amrita Puri|Digvijay Deshmukh|Asif Basra|Manav Kaul|Ashish Kakkad|Muni Jha|Morli Patel|Amitabh Srivastava|Bina Shah|Irfan Khan|Tahir Raj Bhasin|Ajay Jadeja|Sunil Upadhyay
title: Kai po che!
